full_text: Form G-135a Agency Name Check (6-21-54) 18 AUG 1955 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE District Chicago immigration and Naturalization Service File No. 699 884 Sub-office Date St. Paul 8-16-55 DIRECTOR, FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION, DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Washington 25, D.C. out to Storey Attention: INVESTIGATIVE DIVISION 8 - 15 - Please furnish any derogatory information contained in any file - other than fingerprint records - which your Bureau may have concerning the following person: NAME (Surname in CAPS, First, Middle) DATE OF BIRTH SEX COLOR MARITAL 4-13-1904 STATUS M W LIU Maoling PLACE OF BIRTH (City, province or PRESENT NATION- S M state & country) ALITY China Ohinese D W ALIASES (Identify maiden names or nicknames) PARENTS NAMES (Include present address, if known) HEIGHT Live WEIGHT mat EYES Lind Sze-Wen & Men *Chen Liu (deceased) HAIR COMPLEXION IDENTIFYING MARKS OR SCARS 5-8 brn blk RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS (Street & No., RFD, etc.) (City, state and country) FROM TO 630 Lineoln St. N.
